alert.note: Alert for Juncos; Las Piedras; San Lorenzo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 08 at 3:09AM ADT until April 08 at 5:15AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Juncos County in Puerto Rico... Las Piedras County in Puerto Rico... San Lorenzo County in Puerto Rico... * Until 415 AM AST. * At 209 AM AST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
